Trade/Device Name(s): Glucose Shepherd Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Glucose Shepherd Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Glucose Shepherd Pro Blood Glucose meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Glucose Shepherd and Glucose Shepherd Pro blood glucose monitoring systems using amperometric detection in fresh capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Glucose Shepherd systems provide quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various body sites to aid in monitoring effectiveness of diabetes control programs; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or use with neonates.
